category.simplystatus.name: SimplyStatus
config.simplystatus.notConnected:
You are not connected to Discord!
Check if you have it running.
config.simplystatus.notConnectedLinux: If you have Discord installed through a third party app store like Flatpak, Snap, etc. Then look at RPC solutions on the Internet, preferably about your application store and systems
message.simplystatus.ViewIPFalse: §6§lSimplyStatus§r » Server IP address is now hidden!
message.simplystatus.ViewNameTrue: §6§lSimplyStatus§r » The server name is now visible
message.simplystatus.ViewNameFalse: §6§lSimplyStatus§r » The server address is now visible
message.simplystatus.bedrockTrue: §6§lSimplyStatus§r » Status icons changed to those from Minecraft Bedrock Edition
message.simplystatus.bedrockFalse: §6§lSimplyStatus§r » Status icons changed to standard icons
message.simplystatus.broadcastTrue: §6§lSimplyStatus§r » Stream mode has been turned on!
message.simplystatus.broadcastFalse: §6§lSimplyStatus§r » Stream mode has been turned off!
message.simplystatus.broadcastMessage: §6§lSimplyStatus / §cWarning§r » This mode is not saved in configs, and is reset upon re-entering the game
message.simplystatus.ViewOffHandTrue: §6§lSimplyStatus§r » The item in the second hand is now visible
message.simplystatus.ViewOffHandFalse: §6§lSimplyStatus§r » The item in the second hand is now hidden
message.simplystatus.errorIsSinglePlayer: §6§lSimplyStatus§r » You cannot use this key in a single player!
message.simplystatus.hideRPC: §6§lSimplyStatus§r » Your game status is now hidden from users!
message.simplystatus.showRPC: §6§lSimplyStatus§r » Your game status is now visible!
modmenu.descriptionTranslation.simplysta: Simple mod for game status Discord
status.simplystatus.text_DeathThree: %discord% takes a break from the game
status.simplystatus.text_UnknownServer: This server is unknown to us
status.simplystatus.text_goodPlayer: Wow, %discord% might be a good person
status.simplystatus.replaymod: Maybe the player is in ReplayMod
